channel.title: Ports to forward TCP and UDP
channel.description:
Hello, Where may i find the ports to forward for bms dedicated server (steam) ranged like below. Thanks.
TCP 27014-27050
UDP 27000-27030

item.title: Ports to forward TCP and UDP
item.description:
Thanks for the reply
I d/l a fresh server and all is fine (public can see) could of been steam server browsers a little pokey too,
(as they are on hl2mp) i have found this on a steam page on ports, but yes 27015 is the ticket.

Steam Client[/size]

  • UDP 27000 to 27015 inclusive (Game client traffic)
  • UDP 27015 to 27030 inclusive (Typically Matchmaking and HLTV)
  • TCP 27014 to 27050 inclusive (Steam downloads)
  • UDP 27031 and 27036 (incoming, for In-Home Streaming)
  • TCP 27036 and 27037 (incoming, for In-Home Streaming)
  • UDP 4380

Read full topic
item.source: Ports to forward TCP and UDP

item.title: Ports to forward TCP and UDP
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
27015 is the standard Source port for networking and is all you need.

Read full topic

but they cannot, The other server (diff game) show fine.
